column4: My sytem is behaving oddly..sometimes it starts up all graphic effects and sometimes it doesn't........same behaviour in vista
does ubuntu support agpgart-ati module by default?
could be hardware (heat ?) ; check /var/log/syslog in the cases it fails, also messages and look through dmesg.txt after doing dmesg > dmesg.txt in trml
the distros since hardy lack ati - support
